line.comment: * Creates a Subjugator for the CIS
* Creates a Providence Dreadnought for the CIS
*$x = create ship: type={CIS Droid Tri-Fighter} owner=[CIS] addto=$Carrier x=0 y=0 z=0
*$x = create ship: type={CIS Umbaran Fighter} owner=[CIS] addto=$Carrier2 x=0 y=0 z=0

sval.val: Creates a Subjugator for the CIS
Creates a Providence Dreadnought for the CIS
$x = create ship: type={CIS Droid Tri-Fighter} owner=[CIS] addto=$Carrier x=0 y=0 z=0
START $x-> command [COMMAND_ESCORT_ATTACK_NEAREST] : arg1=$Carrier, arg2=[FALSE], arg3=null, arg4=null
$x = create ship: type={CIS Umbaran Fighter} owner=[CIS] addto=$Carrier2 x=0 y=0 z=0
START $x-> command [COMMAND_ESCORT_ATTACK_NEAREST] : arg1=$Carrier2, arg2=[FALSE], arg3=null, arg4=null
